issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.customfield_12310192: Improved FileInputFormat to return better locality for the last split.

fields.summary: Scan benchmark is more than 1.5x slower in 0.23

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The last split generated by FileInputFormat.getSplits considers {{blkLocations.length-1}} to be the hosts for the split.
The last split may be larger than the rest (SPLIT_SLOP=1.1 by default) - in which case locality is picked up from a smaller block.
e.g. 1027MB file with a 128MB split size. The last split ends up being 131MB. The hosts for locality end up being the nodes containing the 3MB block instead of the 128MB block.
fields.summary: last split generated by FileInputFormat.getSplits may not have the best locality

comments.body:
Patch for the last split.
Mapred.FileInputFormat seems to have additional optimizations for rack locality which don't exist in mapreduce.FileInputFormat. The patch does not include a fix for this.

+1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12511536/MR-3710_v1.txt
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    +1 tests included.  The patch appears to include 6 new or modified tests.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 eclipse:eclipse.  The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

    +1 findbugs.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1652//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/1652//console

This message is automatically generated.
Looking through the patch for review/commit.

I just committed this to trunk and branch-0.23. Thanks Sid!

We can merge this into 1.0 on demand.

Integrated in Hadoop-Hdfs-trunk-Commit #1652 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-Hdfs-trunk-Commit/1652/])
    MAPREDUCE-3710. Improved FileInputFormat to return better locality for the last split. Contributed by Siddarth Seth.
